definition: A system of beliefs, practices, and values centered around the worship of a higher power or powers, often involving rituals, moral codes, and a sense of purpose or meaning in life. It is commonly used to refer to organized systems of faith and spirituality that guide individuals or communities in their understanding of the divine and their relationship with it.
